title: tiruvaDi paNiyum
sahitya:
tiruvaDi paNiyum anbar bhava nOi tIrkkum aru marundAm deivam


anupallavi

  aravu puli magizha ambalattADiya aru maraiyudan ayanumm Alum tEDiya


caraNam    sarvEshvaran kubEran tOzan tarikkum uDaiyO pulittOl
parvata kumAri maruvum oru bhAgan parama yOgIshvaran
garvamuDan paTrillAmal IrEzhulagu tAngum Eka nAyakan
nirvikAra guNan mana iruL nIkkum arutjyOti manamurai kadanda haran
